Package controller

Class MovieGoerIO

java.lang.Object
controller.MovieGoerIO
public class MovieGoerIO
extends java.lang.Object
Used to read and write bookings made by a MovieGoer
Version:
1.0

    • writeNewBooking

      public void writeNewBooking​(int custID, java.lang.String bookingID, java.lang.String customerName, int phoneNumber, java.lang.String movieBooked, java.lang.String emailID, java.lang.String time, int numseats, java.lang.String firstseat) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.Exception
      to write a new booking to the customers.txt file
      Parameters:
      custID - customer ID of the customer
      bookingID - transaction ID of the booking
      customerName - Name of the customer
      phoneNumber - Phone number of the customer
      movieBooked - Name of the movie booked
      emailID - email ID of the customer
      time - time of the show booked
      numseats - number of seats booked
      firstseat - first-seat of the booking
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.Exception
